title: Art in the Moment: Wonder Years
short_description: The Art Institute is pleased to partner with Well Connected to provide this virtual Art in the Moment activity for individuals living with dementia and their care partners or family members.
description:
The Art Institute is pleased to partner with Well Connected to provide this virtual Art in the Moment activity for individuals living with dementia and their care partners or family members.

Art in the Moment participants will enjoy a small-group conversation around fun and familiar themes using treasured works of art. The theme for this event, Wonder Years, will focus on images that celebrate youth and familial relationships. Facilitated by trained educators and museum volunteers, this virtual experience will focus on socialization, observation, interpretation, and association. Active participation of a care partner is strongly encouraged to help support the social environment.

This virtual presentation is hosted by Well Connected, a nonprofit community of adults 60+ who connect via phone- or computer-based conversations, lectures, classes, games, and much more.

A computer with internet access is required to participate in this program. To register, please call (877) 797-7299, email coviaconnections@covia.org, or visit Well Connected.
buy_button_caption:
Free, registration required

To register, please call (877) 797-7299 or email coviaconnections@covia.org.
For more information, please visit https://covia.org/services/well-connected/.
